channel.title: How do i change how much a monster hits?
channel.description:
how do i change how much a monster hits cause im making a des treas quest and i need kamil, dessous and damis to hit more that 1's and 2's....fareed already hits in the 20's
oh and how do i make portals to places

item.title: How do i change how much a monster hits?
item.dc:creator: @Ellis_rulez Ellis rulez
item.description:
@Ellis_rulez wrote:

so its when you change the combat lvl of the npc it changes how much it hits??? no it isnt cause you get them lvl 2 men on servers which 1 hit you

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change how much a monster hits?

item.title: How do i change how much a monster hits?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can just.
Go into Npc.cfg.
Change the combat of the npc.

Read full topic
